short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, track and manage all your job applications in one place. Build your professional network and get hired.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Networkio Job Tracker

Effortless Job Tracking: Browse LinkedIn jobs and effortlessly save them to your tracker.

Centralized Dashboard: Access all your saved jobs with ease. Update statuses, view vacancy details including estimated salary, and add your own notes for each listing.

AI-Powered Tools: Craft customized cover letters for each job and simulate interviews with our AI interview tool. Extract keywords to optimize your resume for applicant tracking systems.

Networking Opportunities: Write a short sentence to expand your network and browse profiles of Networkio members who look for potential connections.

Take charge of your job search with Networkio Job Tracker â€“ your all-in-one solution for efficient and effective job hunting.
